name: VoidStar (AhSpike)
description:
This game was made for MGGJ3(Magical Girl Game Jam).   The theme I drew inspiration from was "Schrödinger's Cat/Superposition".  I eventually worked out a system  where any object in the game can be turned into any other object.  

I know this game is a strange concept, but all things considered I think It came out pretty good.

Music by-

Eric Skiff

Joshua McLean

Kevin MacLeod

The design of "Spondee" is (obviously) based on the character  "Cecil the Faun" by Dani Banner.  I didn't design this character, I'm not stealing this character,  It's just a fun reference. Don't @ me.

But do check them out.

https://www.instagram.com/cecilthefaun/
